title: Mithril trimmed armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Mithril trimmed armour is a possible reward from medium Treasure Trails. The set has identical stats to Mithril armour. The armour pieces cannot be made via the Smithing skill.

content:
A player wearing a set of trimmed mithril armour.

Mithril trimmed armour is a possible reward from medium Treasure Trails. The set has identical stats to Mithril armour. The armour pieces cannot be made via the Smithing skill.
